GlobalVariables.StudyDescription: This file contains the metadata, events, and data for REDCap project "EG TEST_ISARIC CORE CRF".
GlobalVariables.redcap:MissingDataCodes: NI, No information UNK, Unknown NASK, Not asked NA, Not applicable

redcap:RepeatingInstrument.redcap:CustomLabel: MEDICATION While hospitalised or at discharge. One record per drug.

ItemGroupDef.Name: MEDICATION PREVIOUS 14-DAYS (include all taken within 14 days prior to this most recent admission/presentation)
CO-MORBIDITIES AND RISK FACTORS (existing prior to admission and ongoing)
SIGNS AND SYMPTOMS ON ADMISSION (first data, within 24 hours of presentation/admission)
HEPATITIS MEDICAL HISTORY (What persistent symptoms did your child have in the last three months?)
VITAL SIGNS & ASSESSMENTS (Record the value furthest from normal range between 00:00 to 24:00 on day of assessment)
TREATMENTS & INTERVENTIONS (Record all interventions received or true between 00:00 to 24:00 on day of assessment)
LABORATORY RESULTS (Record the value furthest from normal range between 00:00 to 24:00 on day of assessment)
COMPLICATIONS (At any time during hospitalisation did the patient experience)
INTERVENTIONS (While hospitalised, were any of the following administered/undertaken? )
